import React from 'react' import "./MarketingHub.css" import { Box, Button, HStack,Image ,Center, Stack} from '@chakra-ui/react' import {ArrowDownIcon} from '@chakra-ui/icons' const MarketingHub = () => { return (

) } export default MarketingHub
